display_long_description:
# Background Story
Peace didn’t last. A mysterious, machine-driven force spreads across the galaxy, destroying everything in its path.

**The future of mankind is in your hands. Will you answer the call?**

# Gameplay
Step into a fully immersive VR co-op experience with up to 6 players.

- Command vital systems aboard your battleship
- Pilot agile interceptors in intense space dogfights
- Deploy to hostile planets for boots-on-the-ground combat
- Repair systems, gather resources, and upgrade your loadout
- Earn credits, ranks, and medals as you rise through the command structure
- Whether you’re a fighter pilot, technician, or frontline soldier—teamwork is key, and everyone gets rewarded equally.

# Key Features
- 6-player online co-op
- Fully interactive VR cockpits – grab joysticks & throttles or use analog sticks
- Space combat & ground missions
- Diverse mission types with replay value
- Customizable equipment & character appearance
- Spatial voice chat for true team coordination
- Progression with badges, unlocks, and promotions
- Supported languages: English, German, French, Spanish

# Can I Play Solo?
Yes! Start a private session and take on the enemy solo. Lower difficulties are balanced for solo players.
